name: Motto Kigaru ni! Oekaki Koubou Plus
name_original: Motto Kigaru ni! Oekaki Koubou Plus
description:
Motto Kigaru ni! Oekaki Koubou Plus is a puzzle game developed by Collavier. It came out on 21-08-2013. It was published by Collavier.
Motto Kigaru ni! Oekaki Koubou Plus is available on Nintendo 3DS.
